languages.text: {n}Мужчина немного бледнеет, затем улыбается — весьма натянуто.{/n} "Что ж... бывает! Надеюсь, парни умерли не за то, что плохо отремонтировали вам нужник, хе-хе".
{n}The man pales slightly, then gives you a rather strained smile.{/n} "Well... it happens! I hope they didn't die because you didn't like the way they'd fixed your privy, heh heh."
languages.original_text: {n}Мужчина немного бледнеет, затем улыбается — весьма натянуто.{/n} "Что ж... бывает! Надеюсь, парни умерли не за то, что плохо отремонтировали вам нужник, хе-хе".

{n}The man pales slightly, then gives you a rather strained smile.{/n} "Well... it happens! I hope they didn't die because you didn't like the way they'd fixed your privy, heh heh."

languages.text: {n}这个男人脸色微变，之后对你露出了紧张的微笑。{/n}“呃……有时碰巧会发生这种事情！我希望那些人不是因为把您的厕所修坏了才丢了性命，呵呵。”
languages.original_text: {n}The man pales slightly, then gives you a rather strained smile.{/n} "Well... it happens! I hope they didn't die because you didn't like the way they'd fixed your privy, heh heh."

traits.locale_text: {n}这个男人脸色微变，之后对你露出了紧张的微笑。{/n}“呃……有时碰巧会发生这种事情！我希望那些人不是因为把您的厕所修坏了才丢了性命，呵呵。”

languages.text: {n}El hombre palidece y te lanza una sonrisa forzada.{/n} «Bueno... ¡Cosas que pasan! Espero que no murieran porque no le gustó cómo le habían arreglado el retrete, je, je».
languages.original_text: {n}The man pales slightly, then gives you a rather strained smile.{/n} "Well... it happens! I hope they didn't die because you didn't like the way they'd fixed your privy, heh heh."

traits.locale_text: {n}El hombre palidece y te lanza una sonrisa forzada.{/n} «Bueno... ¡Cosas que pasan! Espero que no murieran porque no le gustó cómo le habían arreglado el retrete, je, je».

languages.text: {n}男は少し青ざめて、やや緊張気味な顔に笑顔を張り付けた。{/n}「えっと…よくあることです！トイレの修理の仕方が気に食わなくて、殺されたんじゃなければいいですが、アハハ」
languages.original_text: {n}The man pales slightly, then gives you a rather strained smile.{/n} "Well... it happens! I hope they didn't die because you didn't like the way they'd fixed your privy, heh heh."

traits.locale_text: {n}男は少し青ざめて、やや緊張気味な顔に笑顔を張り付けた。{/n}「えっと…よくあることです！トイレの修理の仕方が気に食わなくて、殺されたんじゃなければいいですが、アハハ」

languages.text: {n}Der Mann erblasst ein wenig und lächelt dann gequält.{/n} "Nun ... so was kommt vor! Hoffentlich mussten sie nicht sterben, weil Euch nicht gefallen hat, wie Sie Euer Klo repariert haben, ha ha."
languages.original_text: {n}The man pales slightly, then gives you a rather strained smile.{/n} "Well... it happens! I hope they didn't die because you didn't like the way they'd fixed your privy, heh heh."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Mann erblasst ein wenig und lächelt dann gequält.{/n} "Nun ... so was kommt vor! Hoffentlich mussten sie nicht sterben, weil Euch nicht gefallen hat, wie Sie Euer Klo repariert haben, ha ha."

languages.text: {n}L'homme pâlit légèrement, puis vous lance un sourire légèrement forcé.{/n} « Ma foi... Ce sont des choses qui arrivent ! J'espère qu'ils ne sont pas morts parce que vous n'aimiez pas la façon dont ils avaient nettoyé vos latrines, ha ha. »
languages.original_text: {n}The man pales slightly, then gives you a rather strained smile.{/n} "Well... it happens! I hope they didn't die because you didn't like the way they'd fixed your privy, heh heh."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'homme pâlit légèrement, puis vous lance un sourire légèrement forcé.{/n} « Ma foi... Ce sont des choses qui arrivent ! J'espère qu'ils ne sont pas morts parce que vous n'aimiez pas la façon dont ils avaient nettoyé vos latrines, ha ha. »

languages.text: {n}Adamın benzi hafiften atıyor, ardından oldukça gergin bir şekilde gülümsüyor.{/n} "Şey... Olur öyle arada! Umarım tuvaletinizi onaramadıklarından vurmamışsınızdır, he he."
languages.original_text: {n}The man pales slightly, then gives you a rather strained smile.{/n} "Well... it happens! I hope they didn't die because you didn't like the way they'd fixed your privy, heh heh."

traits.locale_text: {n}Adamın benzi hafifçe atıyor, ardından sana oldukça gergin bir şekilde gülümsüyor.{/n} "Şey... Olur öyle arada! Umarım tuvaletinizi tamirleri hoşunuza gitmediğinden yapmamışsınızdır, he he."
